name: How To
description:
How can you find your legs after all this how can you leave the smooth gloss because outside everything will be sticky clammy hot not just in your mind not just in the cloth where it’s holding your hand telling you this is all something that HAPPENED because of a conversation where she said I don’t think it really matters she said I don’t think it’s real and you said I think it is, don’t you believe that? and she said I don’t believe anything you tell me.

  • an interactive fiction experiment database
  • 10-20 minutes to explore all pages depending on your reading speed
  • there is no right order
